name: Fam or Scam
description:
Tutorial:

Click the ringing phone to answer calls. Click it again to continue the conversation.

Click the Spam or Family Buttons when you think you know which one it is.

The sooner in the conversation, you guess the more points you'll receive, but be careful. Get it wrong and you'll lose points!

play for a high score! (Please post these for my enjoyment)

Esc to exit the program (pretty standard stuff.)

This is my first "full game", but don't pull your punches on that account.
